CustomField.formula:
IF( OR( Owner:User.Profile_Name__c = "TSE", Owner:User.Profile_Name__c = "Sr. TSE", Owner:User.Profile_Name__c = "Jr. TSE" ), Owner:User.Employee_Code__c,
IF( OR( Owner:User.Manager.Profile_Name__c = "TSE", Owner:User.Manager.Profile_Name__c = "Sr. TSE", Owner:User.Manager.Profile_Name__c = "Jr. TSE" ), Owner:User.Manager.Employee_Code__c,
IF( OR( Owner:User.Manager.Manager.Profile_Name__c = "TSE", Owner:User.Manager.Manager.Profile_Name__c = "Sr. TSE", Owner:User.Manager.Manager.Profile_Name__c = "Jr. TSE" ), Owner:User.Manager.Manager.Employee_Code__c,
IF( OR( Owner:User.Manager.Manager.Manager.Profile_Name__c = "TSE", Owner:User.Manager.Manager.Manager.Profile_Name__c = "Sr. TSE", Owner:User.Manager.Manager.Manager.Profile_Name__c = "Jr. TSE" ), Owner:User.Manager.Manager.Manager.Employee_Code__c, '' ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: TSE Id
